phrs.translation: 库尔, 库尔市, 库而, 故尔

sentences.sentence: Chur charge Sternberg Dam 3 km long commercial street, shops, clothing shops, galleries in rows Ringby.
sentences.translation: 库尔·费斯腾达姆商业街长3千米，商店、服饰店、画廊鳞次林比。

sentences.sentence: Marvelous moustaches and swashbuckling sideburns packed out this year’s Alpine Beard Festival in Chur, Switzerland.
sentences.translation: 在今年瑞士科尔举行的阿尔卑斯“美髯大会”上，随处可见那些奇奇怪怪的小胡子和神气活现的鬓角胡须。

sentences.sentence: Colin, , amarried father of two who runs his own media business, said the police haven't figured out how the wallet ended up in Chur.
sentences.translation: 科林现在拥有自己的媒体事业，同时还是两个孩子的父亲。他说库克当地的警方也没搞明白这个钱包是怎么回事。 。
